text: “Ndipo tikadafuna, tikadaupatsa mzimu ulionse chiongoko chake (moukakamiza monga momwe tidawachitira angelo, koma mzimu udapatsidwa mphamvu ndi ufulu wodzisankhira chimene ufuna; chabwino kapena choipa). Koma mawu atsimikizika ochokera kwa Ine: “Ndithu ndizadzazitsa Jahannam ziwanda ndi anthu; onse pamodzi (amene ali oipa).”
